DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine impact eliminate traditional resident work shift ( i.e . great 24 hour length ) patient safety resident educational outcome . In addition , investigator explore key stakeholder ( patient family , nurse , resident physician attend physician ) experience resident undertake shift great 24 hour length compare 16 hour less .
DOC.brief_title: Assessing Impact Change Work Schedule Resident Physicians : Mixed Methods Study
DOC.criteria: Residents complete Intensive Care Unit rotation For focus group interview , patient family member admit study period nurse attend physician work study period
